thread.title_full: Justin Timberlake Performance at the 2017 Oscars | POPSUGAR Entertainment

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Justin Timberlake Performance at the 2017 Oscars | POPSUGAR Entertainment
text:
Justin Timberlake Performance at the 2017 Oscars Justin Timberlake Kicked Off the Oscars With a Rousing Performance of "Can't Stop the Feeling" February 26, 2017 1 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
A performance from Justin Timberlake is maybe the best way the Oscars have ever started. Timberlake, nominated for Trolls anthem "Can't Stop the Feeling," is a pro at getting the crowd worked up, and every A-lister in the room was on their feet for his number. In case you missed it, he and wife Jessica Biel dazzled on the red carpet !
